    • Method Detail

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery(String queryStr)
        throws QueryConstructionException
        constructs a Query working with the string queryStr.

        The query is executed in InferencePSC with a default timeout and default inference parameters.

        Parameters:
        queryStr - the string representing the CycL query
        Returns:
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException
        See Also:
        com.cyc.query.Query#TIMEOUT

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery(String queryStr,
               String ctxStr)
        throws QueryConstructionException
        Returns a query object defined by queryStr asked in Microtheory ctxStr, with default inference parameters.
        Parameters:
        queryStr - The query string
        ctxStr - The Microtheory where the query is asked
        Returns:
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery(String queryStr,
               String ctxStr,
               String queryParams)
        throws QueryConstructionException
        Returns a query object defined by queryStr asked in Microtheory ctxStr, with inference parameters, queryParams.
        Parameters:
        queryStr - the query string.
        ctxStr - the Microtheory where the query is asked
        queryParams - the inference parameters to use for the query. This string should consist of a series of keywords followed by the values for those keywords. The keywords can be found by looking for the #$sublIdentifier for the desired instance of InferenceParameter in the Cyc KB. For example, to limit a query to single-depth transformation and to allow at most 5 seconds per query, use the string ":max-transformation-depth 1 :max-time 5".
        Returns:
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery(KbIndividual id)
        throws QueryConstructionException,
               KbException,
               UnsupportedCycOperationException
        Constructs a Query from a KbIndividual corresponding to a #$CycLQuerySpecification.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        the Query specified by id
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException - if the specified query term has a sentence whose outermost operator is #$ist and the query is loaded from a Cyc server with a system level under 10.154917 (Nov. 2014). A workaround is to edit the query in the KB, removing the #$ist from the query's sentence, and specifying it as the query mt using #$microtheoryParameterValueInSpecification.
        KbException - if idStr does not identify a KbIndividual
        UnsupportedCycOperationException - when run against ResearchCyc 4.0q and earlier
        See Also:
        Cyc.Constants.CYCL_QUERY_SPECIFICATION

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery(KbIndividual id,
               Map<KbObject,Object> indexicals)
        throws QueryConstructionException,
               KbException,
               UnsupportedCycOperationException
        Returns a new Query loaded from a term in Cyc specifying its properties. Terms in the specified query can be replaced with others by providing a non-empty indexicals map.
        Parameters:
        id - the Cyc term
        indexicals - a map of substitutions to be made
        Returns:
        the Query specified by id
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException - if the specified query term has a sentence whose outermost operator is #$ist and the query is loaded from a Cyc server with a system level under 10.154917 (Nov. 2014). A workaround is to edit the query in the KB, removing the #$ist from the query's sentence, and specifying it as the query mt using #$microtheoryParameterValueInSpecification.
        KbException - if idStr does not identify a KbIndividual
        UnsupportedCycOperationException - when run against ResearchCyc 4.0q and earlier

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery(String idStr,
               Map<String,String> indexicals)
        throws QueryConstructionException,
               KbTypeException,
               UnsupportedCycOperationException
        Returns a Query object defined by a CycLQuerySpecification term, and substitutes in relevant values from the indexicals Map.
        Parameters:
        idStr - The instance of CycLQuerySpecification
        indexicals - A map from terms in the query (as loaded from the KB) to the actual values that should be queried with
        Returns:
        a Query object defined by idStr
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException - if the specified query term has a sentence whose outermost operator is #$ist and the query is loaded from a Cyc server with a system level under 10.154917 (Nov. 2014). A workaround is to edit the query in the KB, removing the #$ist from the query's sentence, and specifying it as the query mt using #$microtheoryParameterValueInSpecification.
        KbTypeException - if idStr does not identify a KbIndividual
        UnsupportedCycOperationException - when run against ResearchCyc 4.0q and earlier

      • closeAllUnclosedQueries

        int closeAllUnclosedQueries()
        Closes all unclosed queries.
        Returns:
        the number of queries that were closed
